price: ወደ ኋላ ዞራችሁ በምትሸሹበት ቀን፤ ለናንተ ከአላህ (ቅጣት) ምንም ጠባቂ የላችሁም፡፡ አላህም የሚያጠመው ሰው ለርሱ ምንም አቅኚ የለውም፡፡
arabic: يَوۡمَ تُوَلُّونَ مُدۡبِرِينَ مَا لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِمٖۗ وَمَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِنۡ هَادٖ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma tuwallūna mud'birīna mā lakum mina al-lahi min ʿāṣimin waman yuḍ'lili al-lahu famā lahu min hādin
